ProjectInfo.Name: mag-webapp-v8
ProjectInfo.Scripts: {"dev":"nodemon mag-webapp-v8-integrated/apps/api/src/index.js","lint":"eslint .","format":"prettier --write .","test":"jest","coverage":"nyc npm test","docs:openapi":"node scripts/generate-openapi.cjs","docs:jsdoc":"jsdoc -c jsdoc.json","audit:deps":"npm audit","audit:licenses":"npx license-checker --production --json","load":"artillery run load_test.yml","audit":"npm run lint && npm test","audit:node":"pwsh -File ./scripts/audit-node.ps1 -GenerateHTML","audit:api":"pwsh -File ./scripts/audit-node.ps1 -ProjectPath ./apps/api -GenerateHTML -OutputPath ./apps/api/audit-reports"}

Suggestions: Configure scripts de build/otimização no package.json.
